regulation.label: Regulation
regulation.description: The upstream activity conditionally controls the downstream activity

constitutivelyUpstream.label: Constitutively Upstream
constitutivelyUpstream.description: The upstream activity is normally present and required for the downstream activity.

providesInputFor.label: Provides Input For
providesInputFor.description: The upstream activity produces a molecule that is an input for the downstream activity.

removesInputFor.label: Removes Input For
removesInputFor.description: The upstream and downstream activities have the same input but the upstream activity makes the input unavailable for the downstream activity.

undetermined.label: Undetermined
undetermined.description: There is insufficient data to specify a precise causal mechanism.

direct.label: Direct
direct.description: The upstream activity immediately precedes the downstream activity

indirect.label: Indirect
indirect.description: There are intervening activities between the upstream and downstream activities.
